conbody.p: Backup of RemoteTM Web Server databases can be done in these ways:

ol.li: Exporting all databases as TMX using scripts.
Exporting all databases as TMX using Swordfish III.
Exporting individual databases as TMX using the web interface.
Using the operating system backup functions to make copies of the database files

conbody.p: Exporting data in TMX format is the most portable way. It allows moving data to other server engines and to other RemoteTM instances.
